prompts.name: Comprehensive Code Review Chain
prompts.description: Systematic code review covering structure, functionality, security, performance, optimization, and quality assurance using symbolic tool chain.

arguments.name: target_code
arguments.description: The code to be reviewed and optimized

arguments.name: language_framework
arguments.description: Programming language and framework being used

arguments.name: performance_goals
arguments.description: Specific performance targets or optimization goals

prompts.name: Project Commands Detection
prompts.description: Intelligently detects and configures project validation commands (lint, test, build) for different project types with Enhanced CAGEERF integration

arguments.name: project_path
arguments.description: Path to the project directory

arguments.name: project_type
arguments.description: Type of project (nodejs, rust, python, go, etc.)

prompts.name: Comprehensive CLAUDE.md Generator
prompts.description: Generates comprehensive CLAUDE.md files with all 6 development criteria, Enhanced CAGEERF integration, and project-specific configurations

arguments.name: project_path
arguments.description: Path to the project directory

arguments.name: project_name
arguments.description: Name of the project

arguments.name: project_type
arguments.description: Type of project

arguments.name: architecture_level
arguments.description: Architecture sophistication level 1-10

arguments.name: project_commands
arguments.description: JSON object with detected project commands

prompts.name: Create Modularization Plan
prompts.description: Creates a detailed plan for splitting a file into smaller, more maintainable modules based on analysis of its structure and dependencies.

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: Programming language of the code

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to the file being modularized

arguments.name: analysis_results
arguments.description: Results from the file structure analysis

prompts.name: Transform Code to Modules
prompts.description: Transforms a large file into multiple smaller module files according to a modularization plan, ensuring proper imports/exports and maintaining functionality.

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: Programming language of the code

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to the original file

arguments.name: original_code
arguments.description: The original source code to be modularized

arguments.name: modularization_plan
arguments.description: The detailed plan for how to split the code

prompts.name: Strategic Implementation
prompts.description: Systematically implement a plan phase with architectural alignment, compatibility checking, and progress tracking

arguments.name: plan_path
arguments.description: Path to the plan document to implement (e.g., plans/current/feature-plan.md)

arguments.name: phase_identifier
arguments.description: Specific phase to implement (e.g., '', 'Phase 2A', 'Step 3: Integration')

prompts.name: Component Flow Analysis
prompts.description: Comprehensive component review that tracks data flow, lifecycle, dependencies, and integration points

arguments.name: component_path
arguments.description: Path to the component file (e.g., src/components/UserProfile.tsx)

arguments.name: component_code
arguments.description: The complete component source code to analyze

arguments.name: framework
arguments.description: Framework being used (React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, etc.)

arguments.name: language
arguments.description: Programming language (JavaScript, TypeScript, etc.)
